Combat Notes:
Armor Class Bonus: +10 AC
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dodge Training: +1 Armor Class
Incredible Resilience: +3 HP
Masterful Strike: 4d6 Unarmed damage
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Toughness: +3 HP
Two-Handed Wield Damage Adjustment: +1
Blind-Fight: May reroll miss due to concealment/Invisible foe gains no melee bonus/Suffers half penalty for impaired vision
Brotherhood: +1 attack when fighting among 5+ Dorns
Counterattack: May take AOO on a foe miss 1/rd
Cover Ally: May suffer damage in place of an adjacent ally 1/rd
Defender Abilities: May use Counterattack, Cover Ally, Defender Stunning Fist, Devastating Strike, Rapid Strike, Retaliatory Strike, Strike And Hold, or Weapon Trap 23/dy
Defender Stunning Fist: May stun struck foe (DC 22 Fort neg) for 1 rd 23/dy
Flurry Attack: Reduces two-weapon off hand penalty by 1
Grappling Training: May use Grapple to Disarm, Sunder, or Trip
Improved Grapple: Grapple provokes no AOO/+4 Grapple check
Improved Unarmed Strike: Unarmed attack provokes no AOO and may deal lethal damage
Offensive Training: May blind or deafen stunned foe (DC 26 Fort neg) for 2 rd
One With The Weapon: May use Masterful Strike, Precise Strike, or Stunning Fist w/chosen weapon
Power Attack: May suffer up to -20 attack for equal damage bonus
Precise Strike: Ignores 9 points of foe DR
Rapid Strike: May make an extra attack at highest attack bonus 1/rd
Retaliatory Strike: May make AOO vs. a foe that strikes an ally 1/rd
Speed Training: May make an extra move action each rd
Tunnel Fighting: Suffers no penalty to AC or attack w/a one-handed weapon when squeezing
Turn Undead: R60' May turn or rebuke 2d6+21 HD of undead creatures of up to (d20+51)/3 HD 5/dy
Two-Handed Focus: +1 attack when using a weapon two-handed
Save: Fortitude: +9; Reflex: +12; Will: +10
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +2
Fortitude Bonus: +1 Fortitude
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +4
Cold Fortitude: +5 vs. cold/Suffers half nonlethal damage from cold
Resigned To Death: +4 vs. fear, suffers 1 step less intense on failure

Spell Energy: -2 Spell Slots: W0: 3; W1: 1 Spell DC: W: 8
Spells:
Aid (Faithful2 Ench): Touched gains +1 attack and fear saves and 1d8+10 temporary HP for 20 min
Arcane Mark (W0 Univ): Inscribes permanent personal rune on touched
Bless (Faithful1 Ench): Allies in 50' radius gain +1 attack and fear saves for 20 min
Bless Weapon (Faithful1 Tran): Touched weapon becomes good-aligned and magic; crit vs. evil foes confirmed for 20 min
Cause Fear (W1 Necr): R75' Target w/up to 5 HD flees for 1d4 rd (DC 9 Will shaken for 1 rd)
Consecrate (Faithful2 Evoc): R75' 20' radius gives +3 turn undead and inflicts on undead -1 attack, damage, and saves for 40 hr
Daylight (Faithful3 Evoc): Touched radiates daylight in 60' radius for 200 min
Dispel Evil (Faithful5 Abju): Self gains +4 AC vs. evil and dismisses evil creature via touch (DC 16 Will neg) or spell
Divine Favor (Faithful1 Evoc): Self gains +3 attack and damage for 1 min
Ghost Sound (W0 Illu): R75' Produces sound volume of 20 humans (DC 8 Will disbelieve) for 20 rd
Holy Aura (Faithful8 Abju): 20 creatures in 20' radius gain +4 AC, +4 saves, and SR 25 (evil), suppress mental control, and blind successful evil attacker (DC 19 Fort neg) for 20 rd
Holy Smite (Faithful4 Evoc): R300' Evil creatures in 20' radius suffer 5d8 HP and blindness for 1 rd, neutral half (DC 15 Will half)
Magic Circle Against Evil (Faithful3 Abju): 10' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves, suppresses mental control, bars contact and entry (SR neg) by nongood summoned creatures for 200 min or traps nongood summoned creatures (SR neg) for 20 dy
Open/Close (W0 Tran): R75' Target up to 30 lb opens or closes (DC 8 Will neg)
Prayer (Faithful3 Ench): Allies in 40' radius gain +1 attack, damage, save, and skill, and foes suffer -1, for 20 rd
Prestidigitation (Ch0 Evoc): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Protection From Evil (Faithful1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves vs. evil creatures, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by nongood summoned creatures for 20 min
Magic Notes:
Magecraft (Hermetic): Knows 3 W0 and 1 W1 spells/-2 Spell Energy
Faithful: May use Bless, Protection From Evil, Divine Favor, Aid, Bless Weapon, Consecrate, Daylight, Magic Circle Against Evil, Prayer, Holy Smite, Dispel Evil, Holy Aura 1/dy
Sense Nexus: Successful DC 15 Wisdom senses nexus w/in 5 miles
